_source.short_desc: Gym, Health & Fitness Club, Rec. Center solution with Record Tracking, multiple Membership options, Billing, Reporting, POS. Free demo
_source.long_desc:
Membership Management Software for Gyms, Health Clubs, Boxing & MMA Academies, Personal Training, Fitness, Recreation & Swim Centers, plus Wellness. See at a glance, member's registration details, payment status, & attendance. Run a variety of membership & revenue reports.  Member check-in & 24hr Access Control. Integrated POS software & equipment. With Gym Assistant's intuitive user interface, you will register new members in minutes. No monthly fees.  You own it!
Simple. Powerful. Affordable.
_source.pricing_details: Please contact BioLogic directly for more pricing information
_source.target_audience: All Gyms, fitness & rec centers or wellness facilities plus any business that needs a simple, powerful & affordable way to manage their member data, check-in, billing, 24/7 access control & more!

related_products.short_desc: Manage memberships & waivers, get booked 24/7, seamlessly process payments, send marketing emails & run reports. Starts at $25/month.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one club management software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Advertise your virtual and in-person classes on the Vagaro Marketplace. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage classes and memberships on any device. Send waivers and forms. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody club management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems
related_products.features: Mindbody elevates your customer experience - from the moment they find your health club on our app to their next visit. Step up your club with marketing automations, staff and client management, auto-renewal memberships, payment processing, appointment reminders, reporting, and more. Building your brand? Get a custom app, too. Save time and give your clients the attention they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Boost staff efficiency, delight members, and crush revenue goals with Zenoti, the complete software solution for fitness businesses.
related_products.features: Streamline operations, boost staff efficiency, and delight members with Zenoti, the complete fitness software solution. Easy-to-use, innovative features powered by artificial intelligence automate and simplify gym and studio business management, from new member acquisition to billing collections. More than 20,000 wellness businesses worldwide trust Zenoti to help them scale. On average, clients experience double-digit increases in customer retention, staff retention, and revenue growth.

related_products.short_desc: Club fitness app and training software loved by 150,000 fitness businesses. Engage your members and boost revenue with online training.
related_products.features: Trainerize is a Club Fitness app and training software trusted by 150,000+ fitness professionals and 10,000 health clubs worldwide. Grow your business, increase revenues and boost member retention with online personal training, in-app communication, group training, and workout and nutrition tracking. Trainerize connects to the best apps on the market and allows you to better manage your training clients/members and motivate them like never before. Trainerize is Free for 30 days. Sign Up Now.

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one solution with automated email/SMS marketing, simple scheduling and low cost merchant processing. A top rated software.
related_products.features: WellnessLiving is an all-in-one solution designed for gyms and health clubs.  It features sophisticated mobile tools to manage auto billing, appointment scheduling, key tag access, and auto communications, anywhere/anytime. It also integrates features for business development and retention such as automated email/SMS marketing, reputation management, reporting and rewards.  This eliminates the need for add-on tools reducing costs and streamlining operations.

related_products.short_desc: Easy to use gym software designed for all gym types, boot-camps, and fitness studios.
related_products.features: RhinoFit is a powerful and easy to use gym management software designed for all types of gyms, boot-camps, and fitness studios. Gyms can now streamline operations without paying the big price tag of the large software providers. Our system offers scheduling, 24-hour gym access, member check-ins, workout benchmarks, reporting, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Fitness business software with payment processing, mobile apps, websites, scheduling, automations, retail, reporting & more!
related_products.features: All-in-one fitness business software with everything you need to turn your passion into a successful business. Our custom software is specifically designed for boutique fitness facilities, martial arts studios, affiliate gyms and yoga studios. It includes payment processing, Staff & Member Apps, retail, scheduling, automations, workout tracking, detailed reports & more.

related_products.short_desc: Our club management software gives you an all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue.
related_products.features: Our club management software gives you an all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue. Glofox's club software gets you back to working with your members and trainers instead of staring at your computer. Get insights that will have you making the best business decisions - whether it is highlighting a successful promotion or which trainer boosts client engagement - you will have all the information on your fingertips.

related_products.short_desc: Virtuagym is the ultimate solution for club managers. For the smallest studio to the largest chain, we have you covered.
related_products.features:
Virtuagym is the ultimate solution for club managers looking to take their club to the next level with powerful member engagement and management software.

Reduce hassle by managing memberships, staff member payments, access control and product sales in a scalable cloud-based solution. Save time by invoicing and billing automatically your clients.

Ready to optimize your day and spend more time in your club than on administration work? Book your free demo!

related_products.short_desc: TeamUp is software built for ambitious business owners that take away the complexity of running a fitness club, gym, box, or studio.
related_products.features: TeamUp is software for ambitious business owners that does things differently. Take away the complexity of running your club, gym, or box, with easier to use and better value management software. Keep your classes full and bring all the best parts of your business together in one place. Easily manage all your gym/studio customers' data all-in-one tool, streamline your admin and marketing activities, optimise your sales processes and stand out from competitors with the best client experience.

In addition to technology, SportsEngine provides professional support, consulting, and design services. SportsEngine is part of the NBC Sports Group.

similar_products.short_desc: Built by golf industry professionals, cost-effective, cloud based and easy to use course management software
similar_products.features: Fully Cloud-Based, All-In-One. Background: Prior to co-founding Club Caddie, two golf course owners/operators with technology backgrounds partnered together and resolved to build superior enterprise golf course management software. In 2020, Club Caddie was acquired by Jonas Software, although the leadership team has remained the same. What makes Club Caddie a better option? We literally speak your language. Every aspect of Club Caddie is built and tested by PGA's, F&B, Event Directors, and GMs.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Dance Studio software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Dance Studio tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Dance Studio software significantly cuts time and administrative costs of running a dance studio by automating such functions of studio management as billing, scheduling, student records maintenance, registration, credit card processing and class material printing. For related solutions see Accounting software and Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fitness software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fitness tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fitness software helps you organize your gym with client booking tools, scheduling, financial tracking, and community tools. Fitness software often includes automated billing features, point of sale, and resource reporting. Buyers looking for fitness software may also be interested in Club Management software and Personal Trainer software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Golf Course software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Golf Course tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Golf Course software offers clubs and courses scheduling tools, pro shop POS and inventory tracking, and membership management. These features make it easy for golf course management to keep track of customer payments and preferences, create reports, and manage staffing. Categories related to Golf Course software include Membership Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Martial Arts software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Martial Arts software makes it easy to manage your karate, judo, or any other martial art studio, school or camp. Basic functionality includes appointment scheduling, billing, student management, and examination tracking. Additional features may include school marketing and point of sale. You can find solutions similar to Martial Arts software among Club Management software, Dance Studio software, and Yoga Studio software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

This boutique gym software is an all-in-one system - from scheduling classes to processing payments - with a branded mobile app and website integrations. Increase sales and retain more members with marketing integrations to Facebook, Mailchimp and many more. Give your members the best experience by reducing admin tasks while increasing revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: Increase performance, centralize tasks, and connect with members with ABC IGNITE, the industry's leading club management software.
similar_products.features:
ABC Fitness Solutions is the premier software solution partner for the fitness industry with over 40 years of proven industry knowledge. ABC's next generation gym management solution, IGNITE, is technology for the people who move fitness forward.

The flexible, scalable and intuitive solution addresses all the jobs to be done in a club. Deploying IGNITE as an integrated suite gives gym owners and operators complete control of their businesses and improves member lifetime value.

similar_products.short_desc: Comprehensive easy-to-use fitness center management software.
similar_products.features:
Run your gym with Insight! 

Built from the ground up by gym owners, Gym Insight is a comprehensive software system designed to make your fitness business more profitable. Memberships, personal training, class scheduling, SMS, access management, and even point of sale are made simple and easy, saving time for members, employees, trainers, and managers.  

Customizable dashboards and comprehensive reports let you track a multitude of stats including account payment status, monthly dues, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one gym software with everything you need to run your gym effectively. We Build Fitness Communities.
similar_products.features:
Get ready to streamline your fitness business with a connected system. Triib's all-in-one gym management platform empowers you with a connected desktop platform, self-service kiosk & point-of-sale, and both android and iOS mobile apps, all at one flat rate.

We've built everything under the hood to optimize your day-to-day, saving you time & effort. Get all the tools you need with the best customer success team in the industry. Ensure your success with Triib.

similar_products.short_desc: The Fitness Growth Platform: Your one-stop-shop gym software to convert leads and enhance member communication and engagement.
similar_products.features:
Fit Pro Tracker is the Fitness Growth Platform for business owners. 

Our one-stop-shop fitness software gives studio owners the ability to convert leads and enhance member communication and engagement. 

An intuitive, billing and CRM platform, inclusive of a client app for booking sessions and tracking class history. Created by gym owners, for gym owners.

You now have texting, emailing, and calling capabilities in ONE gym management software!

similar_products.short_desc: Sign up in less than 1 minute and start growing your gym with modern gym management software.
similar_products.features:
Sign up in less than 1 minute and start growing your gym with modern gym management software.

By combining a smooth, modern and intuitive experience with a rich portfolio of advanced features, Gymdesk truly takes the weight off your shoulders when it comes to managing your fitness club. Attendance tracking, booking, scheduling, billing, PoS & Marketing - you will have everything you need at hand. You & your team will notice the difference from day 1. Try 30 days for free!

similar_products.short_desc: Paramount's Pulse Software helps you manage everything in your gym. From your front desk to your back office, we can help!
similar_products.features: Paramount is a full-service software, billing, and customer service call center designed to help you manage your entire gym business. Paramount's Pulse System is the club management software of your dreams. From your front desk to your back office we have everything you need. Some of the software features include dashboard reporting, employee and facility scheduler, point of sale, member portal, personal training software, facility management, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: All-In-One cloud-based member/customer management software and billing for fitness clubs, yoga studios, martial arts centers and more
similar_products.features:
The cloud-based, ALL-IN-ONE iGo360, Fitness Club Management Software features include: easy member sign-up, group fitness and personal trainer scheduling, payment processing, collections, door access, employee compensation, POS sales, and much more. 

Multi-club owners can run real time consolidated and comparative reporting and track member attendance at various locations. 

All this is available anywhere you have an internet connection. Start a free trial now

similar_products.short_desc: ShapeNet management software will optimize employee productivity and maximize member engagement.
similar_products.features: ShapeNet management software will optimize employee productivity and maximize member engagement. Mobile Apps, 24/7 Door Access, Video Fitness Workouts, Auto Credit Card Updater, GAMIFICATION, Contests, Point Tracking, Texting, Paperless Agreements, Fitness Assessments, Scheduling for Classes and PT, Point of Sale, Check-in, EASY online registration, Excellent Support, 20 years experience. similar_products.short_desc: Manage class scheduling and registration, billing and payments, communications, and reporting all from one convenient software online.

similar_products.short_desc: Boost staff efficiency, delight members, and crush revenue goals with Zenoti, the complete software solution for fitness businesses.
similar_products.features: Streamline operations, boost staff efficiency, and delight members with Zenoti, the complete fitness software solution. Easy-to-use, innovative features powered by artificial intelligence automate and simplify gym and studio business management, from new member acquisition to billing collections. More than 20,000 wellness businesses worldwide trust Zenoti to help them scale. On average, clients experience double-digit increases in customer retention, staff retention, and revenue growth.

similar_products.short_desc: Used by organizations to manage their memberships, integrate their other SaaS platforms, & automate their critical tasks.
similar_products.features: Join It is a membership management service that enables organizations to effectively keep track, manage, and grow their community. At our core, we provide a simple database and dashboard interface for organization leaders to monitor developments in their membership. We then integrate this database context with best in class service providers to automate other essential components of an organization, like payment processing, email communication, and event organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Club Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Club Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Club Management software automates management functions including membership, fees, dues and other operations for fitness, social and civic clubs or other similar organizations. These applications offer integrated solutions for access management as well as sales and marketing tools for club facilities. Club Management solutions also help track business performances through automated reporting and forecasting on sales performance, member retention rates and revenue generation. Club Management software is related to Membership Management software, Visitor Management software, and Registration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Dance Studio software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Dance Studio tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Dance Studio software significantly cuts time and administrative costs of running a dance studio by automating such functions of studio management as billing, scheduling, student records maintenance, registration, credit card processing and class material printing. For related solutions see Accounting software and Membership Management software.

related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.
